pages.text: Have you ever wondered what those vials of blood your neighbor is keeping? The labeled hair maybe? Or did you find a lot of nails in the garbage can of your neighborhood? All those items can be considered taglocks for someone.$(2br)A $(thing)Taglock$() is something personal, or commonly used item of a person.
These taglocks can be used for good or bad towards the taglocked person. You can collect it by using a taglock kit on a person's bed, or directly on them. But beware, they may notice!
